advancement.dolphinsofthedeep.root.title: Dolphins of the Deep
advancement.dolphinsofthedeep.root.descr: You're in water, so why don't you get some dolphins?
advancement.dolphinsofthedeep.obtained_d: Obtain a dolphin saddle to ride dolphins!
advancement.dolphinsofthedeep.used_dolph: Use your saddle to ride a dolphin
advancement.dolphinsofthedeep.obtained_d: I haven't got arms, but I've got armour!
Obtain any type of dolphin armour
advancement.dolphinsofthedeep.used_dolph: Ride a dolphin with any type of dolphin armour
